definition.name: NXcg_triangle_set

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays.

symbol.name: d
symbol.doc: The dimensionality, which has to be at least 2.

symbol.name: c
symbol.doc: The cardinality of the set, i.e. the number of triangles.

symbol.name: n_unique
symbol.doc: The number of unique vertices supporting the triangles.

definition.doc: Computational geometry description of a set of triangles.

field.name: number_of_unique_vertices
field.doc: Number of unique vertices in the triangle set.

group.name: triangles
group.doc:
Combined storage of all primitives of all triangles.
This description resembles the typical representation of primitives in file formats such as OFF, PLY, VTK, or STL.

group.name: triangleID
group.doc: Individual storage of each triangle. Users are advised that using such individual storage of primitives may be less storage efficient than creating a combined storage.

field.name: edge_length
field.doc:
Length of the edges of each triangle.
For each triangle values are reported via traversing the vertices in the sequence as these are defined.

field.name: interior_angle
field.doc:
Interior angles of each triangle.
For each triangle values are reported for the angle opposite to the respective edges in the sequence how vertices are defined.
